chapter.metadata: You walk towards the windows. Itâ€™s dark out, so dark you can barely see the world past a few feet. As you stare into the void you swear you can make out a figure in the darkness staring back at you. You look down at the lock, its glued shut. You peek back outside and the figure seems to be gone. You blame it on exhaustion. Wondering what time it could be, you glance at your watch. Crap, battery must be dead.
chapter.text: You walk towards the nearest wall and stop at a large wood frame mounted to concrete. ^1500The word window is written on it.
